one_reviews_text: There’s no way to rotate (using the thumbstick or any other way). This means you have to stand or buy a swivel chair. If you try seated anyway, there’s no height adjustment, so it’ll be like you’re a 6 year old looking upwards towards a painting and reading the info will be very hard.  :)
The quality of the paintings could be better, there is no controller support at all. Everything is controlled by the hmd. There is no sound too.
Can't really get close to the art, but it's all still nice.
